featured.text: ＿27＿ you go, there are buildings in Romanic, Baroque, and Rococo styles that were popular hundreds of years ago.

definition.zh_def: 洛可可風格，一種18世紀的藝術和建築風格，以其華麗的裝飾和曲線形狀著稱。
definition.en_def: Rococo is an 18th-century artistic and architectural style characterized by ornate decorations and curved forms.
definition.example: The interior of the palace was designed in a lavish rococo style, with intricate gold leaf and elaborate moldings.
